name: Sale to minors
text: It shall be unlawful for any person to offer for sale, sell, or give any fireworks or articles pyrotechnic to minors, and for any minor to possess, purchase, or set off, ignite, or otherwise cause to explode any fireworks or articles pyrotechnic, except as provided in section 132D-13. [L 1994, c 180, pt of §1; am L 2006, c 183, §14]
